input.sentences: usually it is just bad news that comes out of plane crashes .
people looking at this picture might think the same is true of this .
however | the two people on board were able to parachute out before the plane crashed .
while the crashed plane is a devastating loss | the safety of the pilots and their story of survival is a miracle .
this can be replaced | and they can not be . i think at the end of the day | it 's all good !
